name: Catch A Letter
description:
This is my first game, it is a little test, i'll upgrade the  game with many features and I hope  the game will give you a little fun.

In this Game, you must defend the space from arrow and make the best score for save the earth.

FUN FUCT: In the early stage of development the game was based on letter but in the alpha there are only arrow =)

The game is in Development, please suggest me some update that i can do. thank you and good play
